summary: A collection of HTTP‑based attack utilities for the NTLM relay framework, providing automated interaction with Active Directory Certificate Services and System Center Configuration Manager services. It can craft ADCS certificate requests, parse SCCM distribution point listings, enumerate and retrieve SCCM policies, and decrypt policy data, all to leverage relayed NTLM credentials.
business_intent: To give penetration testers and red‑team operators automated tools for abusing ADCS and SCCM web interfaces via NTLM relay, enabling credential theft, unauthorized certificate issuance, and information gathering for privilege escalation.
